alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 27 at 8:47PM MST until November 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations, including the city of Casper. * WHEN...Until 5 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, including along Interstate 25, highway 258 south of Casper, and along highway 220 southwest of Casper.
info.instruction: Strong wind gusts can snap tree branches. Avoid windows that face the strong wind. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
